text: aur (musalamaanon tum kuphphaar ke mukaabale ke) vaaste jahaan tak tumase ho sake (apane baazoo ke) zor se aur baidhe hue ghode se ladaee ka saamaan muhayya karo isase khuda ke dushman aur apane dushman aur usake siva doosare logon par bhee apanee dhaak badha legen jinhen tum nahin jaanate ho magar khuda to unako jaanata hai aur khuda kee raah mein tum jo kuchh bhee kharch karogen vah tum poora poora bhar paogen aur tum par kisee tarah zulm nahin kiya jaega
